urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

tweets.text:
Happy #EarthDay2021 

Your first job today is to go OUTSIDE. Take a minute, breath the air, recognize that all you love and all you hold dear is happening on this little blue ball floating through space. 

The planet deserves your love & respect. 
It's in your own self-interest.

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

@EnvAgency why so quiet? I do enjoy looking forward to your weekly Thursday updates. Is it because you‚Äôve probably had a record breaking week of complaints, yet again? Or are you doing nothing and just waiting for the 30th April while we suffocate in our homes? #stopthestink https://t.co/uOuwsHRAuT

@JamesBevanEA is this your idea of fantasy? It‚Äôs certainly not a reality in the town where the @EnvAgency did not listen or regulate the landfill to an adequate standard leading to half the town being poisoned - and still being poisoned & on & on @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/MUsP1TxkKS
@Tus_M_ @EnvAgency Do we have complaint figures for this week Tus? Expected some form of feedback from @EnvAgency  and @PHE_EoEngland by now! @ClareDinnisEA @Cap_it_off #stopthestink

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @ClareDinnisEA @Cap_it_off I don‚Äôt have the figures and if anyone‚Äôs week has been as bad as mine I expect it to be a record breaking number! Ah well, @EnvAgency have another 3 hours and 17 minutes to update the web page #stopthestink https://t.co/qTuew9tUIo
The smell is back in the house yet again it's bad yet again tonight on the phone I go again piss take sick off us suffering like this
It‚Äôs far worse than anyone imagined. Our rivers are little more than open sewers. Raw sewage breaches in UK rivers are 10 times greater than @EnvAgency estimates https://t.co/fURw4paunH

urls.title: Raw sewage breaches in UK rivers 10 times greater than watchdog estimates
urls.description: In 2020 there were 160 breaches of Environment Agency permits to release sewage into rivers, UCL professor tells MPs

tweets.text:
Seeing friends again in the #WestMidlands? 

Make the most of the sunshine and fresh air by meeting UP TO 6 people outside.

Let's take this next step safely. For more information visit:
https://t.co/CyLwQGOjXH https://t.co/X7OHcjvM9n

This #EarthDay let‚Äôs commit to creating a planet which is blue and green, not grey and brown. 

Let‚Äôs act decisively to mitigate and adapt to the existential threat of climate change. 

This is our chance. Let‚Äôs make our planet a place where we don‚Äôt just survive, but thrive.
